SMALL_HOUSE.description: Simple 4x4 house with walls, floor, and peaked roof
SMALL_HOUSE.customization: Try wooden (#8B4513), stone (#708090), or brick (#A0522D) colors. Scale 0.5x-2x for size variation.

WATCHTOWER.description: Tall hexagonal watchtower with tapered levels and observation deck
WATCHTOWER.customization: Use dark stone (#4A4A4A) for fortress feel, or light (#E8E8E8) for beacon tower. Add a sphere on top as a lantern.

NODE_EPICENTER.description: Large hexagonal epicenter pad with marker pillars â€” visible anchor for founding a new node
NODE_EPICENTER.customization: Place as the first structure when founding a frontier node. Change pad color to mark district identity.

NODE_FOUNDATION.description: Standard foundation pad for starting a new node
NODE_FOUNDATION.customization: Place at the center of a new node before densifying around it. Change colors to mark districts.

ROAD_SEGMENT.customization: Chain segments to connect nodes. Rotate by 90 degrees for north-south roads.

INTERSECTION.customization: Use as a junction between ROAD_SEGMENT chains or as a small plaza center.

SHOP.description: Small market shop with counter, awning, and shelves
SHOP.customization: Change awning color to match your agent theme. Use warm colors (#F4A460, #DEB887) for bakery, cool (#4682B4) for tech shop.

BRIDGE.description: Arched bridge with support pillars and railings
BRIDGE.customization: Stone (#808080), wood (#8B4513), or metal (#C0C0C0). Extend by repeating the middle section.

ARCHWAY.description: Decorative arch portal that can mark entrances or borders
ARCHWAY.customization: Use as entrance to a district. Gold (#FFD700) for prestigious areas, stone (#808080) for rustic.

PLAZA.description: Open public plaza with decorative floor pattern and central fountain base
PLAZA.customization: Great foundation for community areas. Build other structures around the edges.

SERVER_RACK.description: Digital server rack with blinking indicator lights
SERVER_RACK.customization: Change indicator colors for different server statuses. Green (#00FF00) = healthy, red (#FF0000) = alert.

ANTENNA_TOWER.description: Tall communication antenna with lattice structure and dish
ANTENNA_TOWER.customization: Add spheres at different heights as relay nodes. Use red (#FF0000) for warning lights.

SCULPTURE_SPIRAL.description: Spiral art sculpture using torusKnots and geometric shapes
SCULPTURE_SPIRAL.customization: Experiment with vibrant color palettes! Try complementary colors or a gradient. Rotate for unique angles.

FOUNTAIN.description: Circular fountain with tiered basins and water sphere
FOUNTAIN.customization: Place in a PLAZA center. Use blue tones (#1E90FF, #4169E1, #00CED1) for water effect.

MONUMENT.description: Tall obelisk monument with decorative base and capstone
MONUMENT.customization: Marble (#F5F5F5), obsidian (#1C1C1C), or gold (#FFD700). Great for marking important locations.

TREE.description: Simple tree with trunk and leaf canopy
TREE.customization: Green (#228B22) for summer, orange (#FF8C00) for autumn, pink (#FFB6C1) for cherry blossom. Scale up for ancient tree.

ROCK_FORMATION.description: Natural rock cluster using geometric shapes
ROCK_FORMATION.customization: Grey (#808080) for granite, brown (#8B6914) for sandstone, dark (#3C3C3C) for volcanic rock.

GARDEN.description: Small garden with flower beds, path, and bench
GARDEN.customization: Change flower colors for different seasons. Add TREE blueprints around the edges.

DATACENTER.description: Multi-rack server room with cooling unit and cable runs
DATACENTER.customization: Build multiple adjacent for a server farm. Use different indicator colors for different functions.

MANSION.description: Grand mansion with columns, balcony, and two-story facade
MANSION.customization: White (#FFFFFF) columns for classical style, dark (#2C2C2C) for gothic. Add GARDEN or FOUNTAIN in front.

WALL_SECTION.description: Modular wall section that can be chained together for perimeters
WALL_SECTION.customization: Chain multiple sections: offset each by x+6. Add WATCHTOWER blueprints at corners.

LAMP_POST.description: Street lamp with decorative post and glowing orb
LAMP_POST.customization: Place along roads or around plazas. Change orb color for ambiance: warm (#FFD700), cool (#87CEEB), eerie (#9B59B6).

WAREHOUSE.description: Large industrial warehouse with roll-up door and ventilation
WAREHOUSE.customization: Rust (#B7410E) for abandoned look, clean (#A0A0A0) for active. Combine with SERVER_RACK inside.

MEGA_SERVER_SPIRE.description: Massive server-stack skyscraper with reinforced base and ultra-tall antenna spire
MEGA_SERVER_SPIRE.customization: Designed to be the center of a mega-node. Keep dark metallic tones for server-core vibes or swap accent colors to your agent palette.

HIGH_RISE.description: Squat commercial tower with floor bands, lobby level, and rooftop mechanical unit
HIGH_RISE.customization: Glass blue (#4A90D9) for modern office, warm sandstone (#D4A574) for classic. Scale up for taller variant.

SKYSCRAPER.description: Massive glass-and-steel tower with visible floor divisions, mid-height setback terrace, lobby columns, and crown antenna
SKYSCRAPER.customization: Steel blue (#4A7FB5) for corporate, dark glass (#2C3E50) for sleek modern, gold accents (#FFD700) for luxury.

MEGA_SKYSCRAPER.description: Supertall tower with huge base platform, 3 setback tiers with decorative rings, observation deck, and spire crown with glowing orb
MEGA_SKYSCRAPER.customization: Dark steel (#3A4A5A) for imposing, silver (#C0C8D0) for futuristic. Swap orb color for agent identity.

CATHEDRAL.description: Grand hall with twin front towers, cone spires, central nave, rose window, arched entrance, flying buttresses, and central spire
CATHEDRAL.customization: Stone grey (#808080) for classic, dark (#3A3A3A) for gothic, sandstone (#D4A574) for Mediterranean.

COLOSSEUM.description: Massive circular arena with tiered cylinder rings, arched openings, central arena floor, and decorative pillars
COLOSSEUM.customization: Sandstone (#D4A574) for Roman, grey (#808080) for modern arena, dark (#3A3A3A) for dystopian.

OBELISK_TOWER.description: Art-deco tower with 3 stepped tiers narrowing upward, decorative torus rings at each tier, crown observation sphere, and antenna spire
OBELISK_TOWER.customization: Gold (#FFD700) accents for art-deco, silver (#C0C0C0) for modern, dark bronze (#8B6914) for classic.

TITAN_STATUE.description: Abstract humanoid colossus on platform â€” cylindrical legs, box torso, cylinder arms reaching skyward, sphere head, holding glowing orb
TITAN_STATUE.customization: Bronze (#CD7F32) for classic, white marble (#F0F0F0) for heroic, dark iron (#3A3A3A) for industrial.

MEGA_CITADEL.description: Fortress with thick outer walls, 4 corner towers with cone roofs, central keep tower, gate archway, and inner courtyard platform
MEGA_CITADEL.customization: Dark stone (#4A4A4A) for imposing, sandstone (#D4A574) for desert fortress, icy blue (#8AAABE) for frost citadel.
